kpi_info.title: RG Max CPU Load
kpi_info.use: The maximum CPU usage at recovery group (RG) level in percent (within 0 and 100 with values rounded to the next integer). The maximum is calculated by taking the average of CPU usage over 30 seconds samples and taking the biggest of those during the reporting period. The measured period of the samples is less than 30 seconds if operators requested a counter snapshot using NE-local interfaces within the time frame. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the CPU-load is increased or decreased. The data is updated on a per-Recovery Group level.
